fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you can convert one player into a random Institution faction role (cannot be an Institution Power). They will not know who you are.
- On any day, you can reveal yourself as the Leader. Your vote now counts as three, and you lose your night ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
You have been converted into a  \_\_\_\_\_\_ by the Leader!
\_\_\_\_\_\_ has revealed themselves to be the Leader! Bow down, peasants.
